solution_line_template: First find how much the euros are worth in dollars: {euros_jack_has} euros * ${euro_to_dollar_rate}/euro = ${euros_worth_in_dollars}<<{euros_jack_has}*{euro_to_dollar_rate}={euros_worth_in_dollars}>>{euros_worth_in_dollars}

Then add that to the amount Jack has in dollars: ${euros_worth_in_dollars} + ${dollars_jack_has} = ${total_money_in_dollars}<<{euros_worth_in_dollars}+{dollars_jack_has}={total_money_in_dollars}>>{total_money_in_dollars}
